subject: Quarterly review reminders
body: Hi Amelia, I published the updated review checklist. Please confirm the schedule before Friday.

subject: Portal access for partners
body: Could you enable the restricted mailbox for the civic partners? They only need read-only access.

subject: Incident recap
body: David, thanks for containing the phishing attempt so quickly. I've uploaded the final notes to the drive.

subject: Training session
body: I reserved the lab for next Tuesday. Please bring the new authentication slides.
